body_html:
I had the same problem after waking up the Ubuntu from sleep mode.
Solution for me was to kill the compiz.
Perhaps anything else which was left on before the sleep must be killed upon the wake up (as some others have also indicated on this issue).

body:
I had the same problem after waking up the Ubuntu from sleep mode. 
Solution for me was to kill the compiz. 
Perhaps anything else which was left on before the sleep must be killed upon the wake up (as some others have also indicated on this issue).
